DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the efficacy of CT-322 comparative to bevacizumab, both in combination with carboplatin and paclitaxel in the treatment of chemonaive subjects with recurrent or advanced non-squamous NSCLC
DOC.brief_title: Ph II of a Novel Anti-angiogenic Agent in Combination With Chemotherapy for the Treatment of Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
